title: Investigate the Murders
content: ok and Investigator Valeria dead, we must search the Tribunal for a way of accessing the Temple of Bhaal. We became Unholy Assassins of Bhaal at the cost of Investigator Valeria's life - we wetted ourselves with her blood and were granted a way to access the Temple of Bhaal. We defeated the Justice Sarevok and his Murder Tribunal, stopping the serial killings in Baldur's Gate for now. To end them for good, we must find Orin.
